abstract: T. Ananda Krishnan, the second-richest person in Malaysia, plans to buy full control of Maxis Communications, Malaysia’s No. 1 mobile-phone operator, which is valued at $9.6 billion.
lead_paragraph: T. Ananda Krishnan, the second-richest person in Malaysia, plans to buy full control of Maxis Communications, Malaysia’s No. 1 mobile-phone operator, which is valued at $9.6 billion.

abstract: AT&T had sued Microsoft, alleging that computers running Windows infringed on AT&T’s speech technology. The ruling restricts the reach of patent holders overseas.
snippet: AT&T had sued Microsoft, alleging that computers running Windows infringed on AT&T’s speech technology. The ruling restricts the reach of patent holders overseas.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON (AP) -- The Supreme Court sided with Microsoft Corp. today in a case that restricts the reach of United States patents overseas.

headline.main: Supreme Court Sides With Microsoft in Patent Case
